0: West Tower rooms are a bit quieter at night being away from the strip and the nightclub but their elevators were always packed
The lobby was full and there were not enough employees to check people in
Why could not some of the staff come into the stairwell and inform people of this
We booked through Virgin Holidays in the UK so had a few extra “ perks ” thrown in with our stay such as a free cocktail in the Chandelier Bar and free breakfast at Wicked Spoon EVERY DAY
it is a unique hotel because you can actually walk into the lobby right from the strip
A few negatives the carpet in the room was very dirty as evidenced by walking around in socks and the elevators were very slow
We also enjoyed late night appetizers at CliQue followed by drinks at the Chandelier bar which is a must go to place if you are staying at the cosmopolitan

It was however disappointing and frustrating to see that despite a large number of arrivals waiting to check in there were only 4 manned reception desks out of a total of I think 10 and it seem to take an age for each incoming guests to be processed

it is not that I mind paying for overpriced coffee in the lobby I just do not want to have to walk down there early each morningAl in all the Cosmopolitan offers a great stay and would consider staying here again
1: Such great service at the chandelier bar lounge
I was staying at the cosmopolitan for a conference alone and decided to go to the chandelier bar to have a drink

Fancy hotelGreat location Nice rooms with all amenities We found on Expedia 120 per night Wed Sat which is really great price Many restaurants to choose from Great pools Check in process and any interaction with the front desk takes long time looks like they are not staffed enough and their check in process is so slow No flexibility in check out time Concierge service was n’t much helpful although we announce we are planning a celebration Housekeeping is very slow when needed service The buffet is described in another post but feel free to skip it Marquee day club is great and also the other pools Will come again if the price will be right
Recommend inside the chandelier at level 15
And how cool is the big chandelier in the middle if the hotel
The rooms are well laid out clean and come with great amenities
We went for the Chandelier Bar and it lives up to the name
Great convention hotel with many amenities
I liked how the entrance to the hotel is covered the valet pickup has its own designated spot downstairs which is a nice area for valet pickup
